knimeNode.name: Add Proteins
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds proteins for all transcripts of the input genes to the output table

fullDescription.intro: Reports protein sequences (of different types) for each transcript of the genes specified in the input table using the Ensembl genome database as the source for data.
fullDescription.option: Specify the genome identifiers provided in the input table. Only genomes provided by the chosen ENSEMBL server are shown.
Select the column with the gene ID's to locate in the Ensembl database

ports.inPort: List of ID's representing gene names in the configured species
ports.outPort: Output table consisting of protein id's and sequence data
